// guide NEXT Welcome! 
 This fast guidebook will show you 
 how to use this application. At the first, pick up image 
 from your gallery, in which 
 you want to balance white. 1. You can choose 
 any of converted image 
 from this progress bar. 2. Than you will see 
 enlarge image here. 3. If you choose White Patch filter, 4. tap on white area 
 in image view for converting 5. You can save image from view 
 with this button 6. or go back and choose 
 another image from your gallery. Now you can start use 
 White Balance application
